Sentencas: Carbon deposition is a primary concern during operation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) fueled with carbon-containing fuels.
Titulo: Anode regeneration following carbon depositions in an industrial-sized anode supported solid oxide fuel cell operating on synthetic diesel reformate

Sentencas: It leads to cell degradation and thus reduces SOFC sustained operation and durability.
Titulo: Anode regeneration following carbon depositions in an industrial-sized anode supported solid oxide fuel cell operating on synthetic diesel reformate

Sentencas: This paper reports on an experimental investigation of carbon formation on the nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni/YSZ) anode of an anode-supported SOFC and its regeneration.
Titulo: Anode regeneration following carbon depositions in an industrial-sized anode supported solid oxide fuel cell operating on synthetic diesel reformate

Sentencas: The cell was fueled with a synthetically produced diesel reformate to investigate and simulate the cell behavior under real operating conditions.
Titulo: Anode regeneration following carbon depositions in an industrial-sized anode supported solid oxide fuel cell operating on synthetic diesel reformate

Sentencas: For this purpose the cell was operated under load to determine the critical operating time.
Titulo: Anode regeneration following carbon depositions in an industrial-sized anode supported solid oxide fuel cell operating on synthetic diesel reformate

Sentencas: Rapid carbon generation, such as at open circuit voltage (OCV), can be prevented when the cell is under load.
Titulo: Anode regeneration following carbon depositions in an industrial-sized anode supported solid oxide fuel cell operating on synthetic diesel reformate

Sentencas: Carbon depositions were detected using scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and further analyzed by Raman spectroscopy.
Titulo: Anode regeneration following carbon depositions in an industrial-sized anode supported solid oxide fuel cell operating on synthetic diesel reformate

Sentencas: Industrial-size cells suitable for commercial applications were studied.
Titulo: Anode regeneration following carbon depositions in an industrial-sized anode supported solid oxide fuel cell operating on synthetic diesel reformate

Sentencas: This study proves the reversibility of carbon formation and the reproducibility of the regeneration process.
Titulo: Anode regeneration following carbon depositions in an industrial-sized anode supported solid oxide fuel cell operating on synthetic diesel reformate

Sentencas: It shows that carbon formations can be recognized and effectively, fully and cell-protecting regenerated.
Titulo: Anode regeneration following carbon depositions in an industrial-sized anode supported solid oxide fuel cell operating on synthetic diesel reformate

Sentencas: It indicates the excellent possibility of using SOFCs in the automotive industry as an auxiliary power unit (APU) or combined power-heat unit, operated with diesel reformate, without danger from cell degradation caused by carbon-containing fuels.
Titulo: Anode regeneration following carbon depositions in an industrial-sized anode supported solid oxide fuel cell operating on synthetic diesel reformate
